price: 35. Waxayna ogaan kuwa ka dooda Aayadahayaga inaysan u sugnaanin meel ay magan galaan.
arabic: وَيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayaʿlama alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣin
